mapper.insert: insert into ecs_supplier_money_log (logid, rebateid, addtime, status, reason, supplier_money, doman, supplier_id) values (#{logid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rebateid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{addtime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supplierMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{doman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supplierId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update ecs_supplier_money_log set rebateid = #{rebateid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, addtime = #{addtime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, reason = #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, supplier_money = #{supplierMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, doman = #{doman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, supplier_id = #{supplierId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where logid = #{logid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select logid, rebateid, addtime, status, reason, supplier_money, doman, supplier_id from ecs_supplier_money_log
